Say “OK Hound… play the hottest songs” to listen in hands-free mode

Spotify Premium users can now play full songs in SoundHound with LiveLyrics®. You can even navigate the song via lyrics by double tapping on them. Just connect to get started!

Includes additional bug fixes and performance updates.

Spotify Premium users can now play full songs in SoundHound with LiveLyrics®. You can even navigate the song via lyrics by double tapping on them. Just connect to get started!

Includes additional bug fixes and performance updates.

Connect to Apple Music!
-Automatically save your search history to a playlist in Apple Music.
-Say “OK Hound… play ‘Down’ by Marian Hill”. Quickly find and play an Apple Music song hands-free.
-Stream the full song in SoundHound while enjoying

Connect to Apple Music!
-Automatically save your search history to a playlist in Apple Music.
-Say “OK Hound… play ‘Down’ by Marian Hill”. Quickly find and play an Apple Music song hands-free.
-Stream the full song in SoundHound while enjoying

Thanks for using SoundHound! To bring you the best experience, we make regular updates to fix bugs and improve performance.

Your favorite music discovery and recognition app has an all new, streamlined look! SoundHound 8 recognizes songs faster, is easier to navigate, comes equipped with ‘OK Hound…’, the best way to find music with just your voice. Get the most out of SoundHou

Optimized for iPhone X and bug fixes

Listen to your favorite Spotify playlists in SoundHound!

Spotify Premium users: Stream full songs in SoundHound. Interact with the LiveLyrics® to navigate the song - double tap a line to jump to the chorus, skip ahead, or replay from the beginning

Listen to your favorite Spotify playlists in SoundHound!

Spotify Premium users: Stream full songs in SoundHound. Interact with the LiveLyrics® to navigate the song - double tap a line to jump to the chorus, skip ahead, or replay from the beginning
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

SoundHound for Apple Watch is back and it’s better than ever! Apple Watch users can identify songs and sing-along with LiveLyrics right from their wrist.

With an Apple Watch Series 3 (and an active cellular connection) you can even use the SoundHou

SoundHound for Apple Watch is back and it’s better than ever! Apple Watch users can identify songs and sing-along with LiveLyrics right from their wrist.

With an Apple Watch Series 3 (and an active cellular connection) you can even use the SoundHou

Love using SoundHound to play music? We’ve made it even easier to find your next song.
• Use your voice on the music player by tapping the microphone button
• New smart search will suggest relevant songs, artists, and albums as you type

Love using SoundHound to play music? We’ve made it even easier to find your next song.
• Use your voice on the music player by tapping the microphone button
• New smart search will suggest relevant songs, artists, and albums as you type

Did you know you'll never lose your history with a SoundHound account? Register in one easy step!

Song, Album, and Artist pages have a brand new look! The album art now takes center stage, and we’ve made it easier than ever to play, favorite, and share your songs with friends. Stream full length tracks, sing along with LiveLyrics®, and automatically a

Song, Album, and Artist pages have a brand new look! The album art now takes center stage, and we’ve made it easier than ever to play, favorite, and share your songs with friends. Stream full length tracks, sing along with LiveLyrics®, and automatically a

You can now use Siri shortcuts for SoundHound! For example, ask Siri, “What song is this?” and SoundHound will open and automatically identify the songs playing around you. There’s also a new animation that plays when a discovered song is added to your Hi

You can now use Siri shortcuts for SoundHound! For example, ask Siri, “What song is this?” and SoundHound will open and automatically identify the songs playing around you. There’s also a new animation that plays when a discovered song is added to your Hi
Have ideas on how we can improve? We’d love to hear from you. Now you can submit feedback directly within the app! Just go to Settings and tap “Contact Us.”
Have ideas on how we can improve? We’d love to hear from you. Now you can submit feedback directly within the app! Just go to Settings and tap “Contact Us.”
For those who play songs through preview, we've made it easier to watch the music videos of your recently discovered songs. Just tap the YouTube icon on top of the song page.
For those who play songs through preview, we've made it easier to watch the music videos of your recently discovered songs. Just tap the YouTube icon on top of the song page.
Sharing your favorite music is faster than ever! The list of sharing options for posting songs has been updated—with the available apps that you share to the most placed at the top.
Sharing your favorite music is faster than ever! The list of sharing options for posting songs has been updated—with the available apps that you share to the most placed at the top.
With the new history page, you can easily access, listen, and share your recent discoveries and favorites. You can also search your history by song, artist, or album name.
With the new history page, you can easily access, listen, and share your recent discoveries and favorites. You can also search your history by song, artist, or album name.

Bug fixes and improvements.

Now you can share all your song discoveries to your Instagram story! You can even share using your voice:

Say “OK Hound…”
“Share on Instagram Stories”
“Put it on my story”
“Share to my Insta story”

“Share to my Insta story”

Discovering music just got a whole new look! Now when you tap the big orange button, you’ll see SoundHound quickly match the audio with an updated design. We hope you enjoy the new experience and keep on finding the music you love.

Discovering music just got a whole new look! Now when you tap the big orange button, you’ll see SoundHound quickly match the audio with an updated design. We hope you enjoy the new experience and keep on finding the music you love.

Now, you can sing along to the hottest songs on the charts with LiveLyrics® when playing 30-second previews or SoundBites! No music streaming service connection is required. Open SoundHound, pick a song, and sing your heart out!
